completion.autoRequire.markdownDescription: When the input looks like a file name, automatically `require` this file.

completion.displayContext.markdownDescription: Previewing the relevant code snippet of the suggestion may help you understand the usage of the suggestion. The number set indicates the number of intercepted lines in the code fragment. If it is set to `0`, this feature can be disabled.

completion.postfix.markdownDescription: The symbol used to trigger the postfix suggestion.

completion.showParams.markdownDescription: Display parameters in completion list. When the function has multiple definitions, they will be displayed separately.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Always show context words in suggestions.
Contextual words are only displayed when suggestions based on semantics cannot be provided.

completion.workspaceWord.markdownDescription: Whether the displayed context word contains the content of other files in the workspace.

diagnostics.disable.markdownDescription: Disabled diagnostic (Use code in hover brackets).

markdownEnumDescriptions: Only when these files are opened will it be diagnosed.

diagnostics.libraryFiles.markdownDescription: How to diagnose files loaded via `Lua.workspace.library`.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Only when these files are opened will it be diagnosed.

diagnostics.neededFileStatus.markdownDescription:
* Opened:  only diagnose opened files
* Any:     diagnose all files
* Disable: disable this diagnostic

ambiguity-1.description: 优先级歧义，如：`num or 0 + 1`，推测用户的实际期望为 `(num or 0) + 1`

duplicate-index.description: 在字面量表中重复定义了索引

global-in-nil-env.description: 不能使用全局变量（ `_ENV` 被设置为了 `nil`）

lowercase-global.description: 首字母小写的全局变量定义

newfield-call.description: 在字面量表中，2行代码之间缺少分隔符，在语法上被解析为了一次索引操作

newline-call.description: 以 `(` 开始的新行，在语法上被解析为了上一行的函数调用

redundant-parameter.description: 函数调用时，传入了多余的参数

redundant-value.description: 赋值操作时，值的数量比被赋值的对象多

undefined-env-child.description: `_ENV` 被设置为了新的字面量表，但是试图获取的全局变量不再这张表中

diagnostics.neededFileStatus.title: neededFileStatus

ambiguity-1.description: 优先级歧义，如：`num or 0 + 1`，推测用户的实际期望为 `(num or 0) + 1`

duplicate-index.description: 在字面量表中重复定义了索引

global-in-nil-env.description: 不能使用全局变量（ `_ENV` 被设置为了 `nil`）

lowercase-global.description: 首字母小写的全局变量定义

newfield-call.description: 在字面量表中，2行代码之间缺少分隔符，在语法上被解析为了一次索引操作

newline-call.description: 以 `(` 开始的新行，在语法上被解析为了上一行的函数调用

redundant-parameter.description: 函数调用时，传入了多余的参数

redundant-value.description: 赋值操作时，值的数量比被赋值的对象多

undefined-env-child.description: `_ENV` 被设置为了新的字面量表，但是试图获取的全局变量不再这张表中

diagnostics.workspaceDelay.markdownDescription: Latency (milliseconds) for workspace diagnostics. When you start the workspace, or edit any file, the entire workspace will be re-diagnosed in the background. Set to negative to disable workspace diagnostics.

diagnostics.workspaceRate.markdownDescription: Workspace diagnostics run rate (%). Decreasing this value reduces CPU usage, but also reduces the speed of workspace diagnostics. The diagnosis of the file you are currently editing is always done at full speed and is not affected by this setting.

hint.arrayIndex.markdownDescription: Show hints of array index when constructing a table.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Show hints only when the table is greater than 3 items, or the table is a mixed table.

hint.paramName.markdownDescription: Show hints of parameter name at the function call.
markdownEnumDescriptions: All types of parameters are shown.
Only literal type parameters are shown.

hint.paramType.markdownDescription: Show type hints at the parameter of the function.

hint.setType.markdownDescription: Show hints of type at assignment operation.

hover.enumsLimit.markdownDescription: When the value corresponds to multiple types, limit the number of types displaying.

hover.previewFields.markdownDescription: When hovering to view a table, limits the maximum number of previews for fields.

hover.viewNumber.markdownDescription: Hover to view numeric content (only if literal is not decimal).

hover.viewString.markdownDescription: Hover to view the contents of a string (only if the literal contains an escape character).

hover.viewStringMax.markdownDescription: The maximum length of a hover to view the contents of a string.

misc.parameters.markdownDescription: [Command line parameters](https://github.com/sumneko/lua-telemetry-server/tree/master/method) when starting the language service in VSCode.

runtime.builtin.markdownDescription:
Adjust the enabled state of the built-in library. You can disable (or redefine) the non-existent library according to the actual runtime environment.

* `default`: Indicates that the library will be enabled or disabled according to the runtime version
* `enable`: always enable
* `disable`: always disable

runtime.fileEncoding.markdownDescription: File encoding. The `ansi` option is only available under the `Windows` platform.

runtime.nonstandardSymbol.markdownDescription: Supports non-standard symbols. Make sure that your runtime environment supports these symbols.

runtime.path.markdownDescription:
When using `require`, how to find the file based on the input name.
Setting this config to `?/init.lua` means that when you enter `require 'myfile'`, `${workspace}/myfile/init.lua` will be searched from the loaded files.
if `runtime.pathStrict` is `false`, `${workspace}/**/myfile/init.lua` will also be searched.
If you want to load files outside the workspace, you need to set `Lua.workspace.library` first.

runtime.pathStrict.markdownDescription: When enabled, `runtime.path` will only search the first level of directories, see the description of `runtime.path`.

runtime.plugin.markdownDescription: Plugin path. Please read [wiki](https://github.com/sumneko/lua-language-server/wiki/Plugin) to learn more.

runtime.special.markdownDescription:
The custom global variables are regarded as some special built-in variables, and the language server will provide special support
The following example shows that 'include' is treated as' require '.
```json
"Lua.runtime.special" : {
    "include" : "require"
}
```

semantic.enable.markdownDescription: Enable semantic color. You may need to set `editor.semanticHighlighting.enabled` to `true` to take effect.

semantic.keyword.markdownDescription: Semantic coloring of keywords/literals/operators. You only need to enable this feature if your editor cannot do syntax coloring.

telemetry.enable.markdownDescription: Enable telemetry to send your editor information and error logs over the network. Read our privacy policy [here](https://github.com/sumneko/lua-language-server/wiki/Privacy-Policy).

window.progressBar.markdownDescription: Show progress bar in status bar.

window.statusBar.markdownDescription: Show extension status in status bar.

workspace.checkThirdParty.markdownDescription:
Automatic detection and adaptation of third-party libraries, currently supported libraries are:

* OpenResty
* Cocos4.0
* LÖVE
* LÖVR
* skynet
* Jass

workspace.library.markdownDescription: In addition to the current workspace, which directories will load files from. The files in these directories will be treated as externally provided code libraries, and some features (such as renaming fields) will not modify these files.

workspace.preloadFileSize.markdownDescription: Skip files larger than this value (KB) when preloading.

workspace.userThirdParty.markdownDescription: Add private third-party library configuration file paths here, please refer to the built-in [configuration file path](https://github.com/sumneko/lua-language-server/tree/master/meta/3rd)
